TopicTitle: DE IVA Extension only half working?

Articles.Content:
So  have installed DE IVA Extension before and it functioned fine then (only about a week ago) but I was interested in getting astrogater, chatterer, and hullcams, which I did, however to my surprise it's no longer functioning. It shows the monitors and frames for where the switches go, but the monitors are non functional. Side note: they do function when I have the iva set to just rpm

I have tried everything I can think of including redownloading everything, trying older versions, using just de IVA and it's dependencies, and I can't seem to find a fix
RPM is no longer maintained, sadly. Its dependencies no longer operate properly. I had my fair share of frustration trying to make it work. Perhaps try another mod?
